alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 09 at 10:43AM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap, Fergus County below 4500ft, Meagher County Valleys, and Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains
